extensionDescription.message: Changes the colour of Firefox tab bar to match the website theme.

reinstallTip.message: Preference data could be corrupted. Please remove the add-on, and re-install the add-on after rebooting Firefox. I’m sorry for your inconvenience!

reportAnIssue.message: Report an issue / submit a suggestion / translate this add-on

resetRuleConfirm.message: Do you want to reset all the rules?

forceModeTooltip_bright.message: Allow tab bar to turn bright (might cause flashing)

forceModeTooltip_dark.message: Allow tab bar to turn dark (might cause flashing)

dynamicModeTooltip.message: Keeps updating tab bar colour while browsing within a web page

noThemeColourModeTooltip.message: Always ignore theme colour defined by the website

pageIsProtected.message: This page is protected by browser

colourForPlainTextViewer.message: Using colour for plain text viewer

errorOccured.message: An error occurred, using fallback colour

colourForHomePage.message: Tab bar colour for home page can be configured in settings

useDefaultColourForAddon.message: Using specified colour for pages related to $1

useRecommendedColourForAddon.message: Recommended colour for pages related to $1 is available

specifyColourForAddon.message: Click “Specify a color” to open settings and specify tab bar colour for pages related to $1

themeColourIsUnignored.message: Theme colour defined by the website is un-ignored

themeColourNotFound.message: Theme colour is not found, colour is picked from the web page

themeColourIsIgnored.message: Theme colour defined by the website is ignored

colourIsPickedFrom.message: Colour is picked from an HTML element matching $1

colourIsSpecified.message: Colour for this domain is specified in the settings

bacauseThemeColourIsIgnored.message: , because theme colour defined by the website is ignored

usingThemeColour.message: Using theme colour defined by the website

usingFallbackColour.message: No colour is available, using fallback colour

colourPickedFromWebpage.message: Colour is successfully picked from the web page
